name: Fish.zip
description:
Zip and Unzip fish.

First game made cooperatively.
For Ludum Dare 37 "One Room".

Goal
Move to anywhere in the highlighted area.

Controls
Arrow keys/WSAD: MOVE
R: RESET

By
Code&SFX: buckle2000
Art: Sapphira
(both ldjam.com and ludumdare.com account name)

If you know lua, making your own level should be easy!
Example below:
https://github.com/buckle2000/ld37/blob/master/raw...
